name: EDGE Tech Corp
tag_list: hardware, memory, ram, manufacturer, laptop, desktop, computer, flash-drives, hard-drives, ssd, solid-state-drives
overview:
EDGE Tech Corp. is a leading U.S.-based supplier of DRAM and memory upgrades, portable external storage and flash devices, founded in 1986. EDGE Tech provides top-of-the-line memory upgrades for virtually every server, router, PC, laptop, printer or Mac. To guarantee 100% performance and compatibility, all products are double-tested in our state-of-the-art compatibility lab. EDGE memory is built with premium components and is backed by a lifetime warranty with free U.S.-based technical support. Experience maximum system performance at an affordable price - upgrade with EDGE today.

At the age of 14, EDGE’s president and CEO, Jeff Thompson, began the company with $2,500 he had saved from a newspaper route in Ada, Okla. With a fascination for the technology market, he began buying and selling computer parts in the Dallas Morning News. Today, EDGE is one of the largest and most respected companies in its industry.

Its eCommerce, marketing, and sales offices are located in Dallas, and EDGE operations reside in its 46,000-square-foot headquarters facility in Ada.
